post.title: Reddit's top free thinkers at their peak

body:
This is not free thinking.  Free thinking suggests that you control your own thoughts.

Perhaps this is best described as programmed thought (being told what to think).

This is not free thinking. Free thinking suggests that you control your own thoughts.

post.title: Reddit's top free thinkers at their peak

body:
Holy crap, I can't believe how upvoted that is.

People need to be more tolerant of other's ideas and way of thinking. 

The media everyone consumes is just so polarizing. Telling them that conservatives are racist/fascists/etc, and liberals are amoral/degenerates/etc, it's insane that people believe that. 

It's just the far edges of those ideologies that are like that.

body:
When even a presidential candidate is saying "if you have to think about who to vote for, you ain't black", you know political conversation has really hit rock-bottom.

Still, it keeps us all distracted fighting each other I suppose.

body: Censorship is how leftism survives. When you have complete unrestricted freedom of speech, those forums tend to lean right. Political correctness, IE racism, sexism, bigotry, and all things offensive to leftists, is designed to stifle opposition. How can you win a war by following the rules your enemy has set for you to follow?

body:
Tangent, but it really makes me laugh that the people who get hysterical about "cultural appropriation" co-opted a term for African Americans who take an interest in their indigenous culture and history.

It makes me cringe every time someone uses it like an old dude trying to be down with the kids

body:
it's reddit, everything they don't like is "white supremacy"

"I'm a vegan, you eat meat?  WHITE SUPREMACIST!"

"I like green M&M's, I see a comment from your history and you claimed to like blue M&M's, YOU'RE A FUCKING WHITE SUPREMACIST"

That's their logic and their only argument, which is why they rely so much on censorship.

it's reddit, everything they don't like is "white supremacy"

body:
I swear black conservatives are treated so poorly in this time, even more so than white conservatives and it pisses me off so much. The left doesn’t care about blacks and they don’t want them to think freely (they probably think they need to be “babied” and can’t think freely, which is **WRONG**. Blacks are just like everyone else and don’t need a liberal telling them what to do).

These “progressives” have been calling black conservatives coons and the n-word left and right. Tim Scott got racial threats not too long ago.

But because they’re right wingers nobody cares. Smh. Sorry for the rant.
